entities.name: the dark mark
entities.description: The Dark Mark is mentioned as something that has been conjured. It is described as a physical entity, and Mr. Crouch's reaction to it suggests that it is significant.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is mentioned as someone who has been affected by the Dark Mark. She is described as being stunned, and Bagman expresses surprise at her condition.

entities.name: mr. crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is mentioned as someone who has returned empty-handed and is acting strangely. He is described as having a ghostly white face, twitching hands, and a jerky manner of speaking.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is mentioned as someone who is inquiring about the situation. He is described as having a round, shiny face and expressing surprise at Winky's condition.

relationships.description: The Dark Mark has affected Winky, causing her to be stunned. This is described in the text as 'She'd need a wand, for a start!' which suggests that Winky would not have been able to conjure the Dark Mark on her own.
The Dark Mark has caused Mr. Crouch to react strangely, as described in the text: 'His face was still ghostly white, and his hands and his toothbrush mustache were both twitching.'
Bagman has expressed concern for Winky's condition, as described in the text: 'What happened to her?' and 'No!'
